dct_title_s: Map of the avenue leading to Golden Gate Park
dct_description_sm: Wm. Hammond Hall Draughts ; Lith. Britton & Rey, S.F.
Covers Panhandle Park and surrounding blocks, as well as eastern edge of Golden Gate Park.

Collector's note: The map extends from Broderick St. into the Park for a short distance, and from Waller to Grove. It is a simple but attractive map. This was removed from First Biennial Report of the San Francisco Park Commissioners, 1870-71, San Francisco, 1872.
From the First Biennial Report of the San Francisco Park Commissioners, 1870-71, San Francisco, 1872.
